articles.description: The Senegalese star, who had a year left on his contract at Klopp's Liverpool, completed a move to Bayern Munich this summer in a transfer which could reach £35million.
articles.content:
Jurgen Klopp has stated Sadio Mane can play until the age of '38 or 39' due to his outstanding physical condition.
